product_name: REI Table Top French Coffee Press - 32 fl. oz.
long_description: Enjoy the rich, smooth flavor of French press coffee from the comfort of your campsite with the 32 fl. oz. REI Table Top French coffee press. Simple to use-add coarse ground coffee or loose-leaf tea and near-boiling water; let steep for 4 min. then press the plunger and pour. Built-in spout has a fine-mesh screen to filter out the grounds while you pour. Vacuum-insulated, double-walled stainless-steel carafe keeps your beverage hot. Holds 32 fl. oz. Handwash the REI Table Top French coffee press with soap and warm water.
short_description: Enjoy the rich, smooth flavor of French press coffee from the comfort of your campsite with the 32 fl. oz. REI Table Top French coffee press.
